entry.title: Public Policy Forum to Explore Current U.S. Drug Policy
entry.summary: Mexican narcotics-related violence has spilled over into the American Southwest, and California is debating legalizing marijuana in order to generate tax revenue. President Barack Obama's attorney general has indicated he will end raids on medial marijuana dispensaries that comply with state laws. These and other drug-related issues will be the focus of a RAND public policy forum: "Drug Policy in 2009: Are We Still a Nation at War?"
